summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6127 for the improvement of South 115th Street from 69th Place South to Cornell Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85174, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
